name: Rolling ball (IT18258172)
description: “Rolling Ball” The Unity Game Engine was used to create the Ball Runner Game project. The "C#" programming language was utilized to create this project. Assets such as C# scripts, prefabs, sprite pictures, animation, and more are included in the project file. Ball Runner is a 3D arcade game that was created specifically for PCs and Android phones. The graphics of the game are adequate, and the controls are user-friendly.
